channel.title: Mythik Gaming! The 562 experience of a life time
channel.description:
Hey welcome to our development page, [b]Introduction[/b] Well... Were using runesource 562, Witch is a very basic source, not many skills working at all. Has a very basic shop system witch is very glitchy. A few commands have been added also a few shops. [size=18pt]Server Infomation[/size] Woodcutting 90% Fishing 60% Fletching 0% Slayer 85% firemaking 100% Agility 100% Cooking 58% Strength, range, mage, attack & defence 100% Prayer 100% All ancient magic spells. All Normal magic spells. Some lunar magic spells. White portal 99.9% Dangerous pking 100& Working EP [size=18pt]Our Goals![/size] - A good economic system, no ::item command. - A player count of 10 active players. - Working quest's. - Minigames such as Pest Controll & Warriors Guild. - Woking skills, Woodcutting, Herblore, Fishing ect. - A dedicated team willing to give there time to help inprove Mythik. - Nice community - And alot more! [b]Aplications;[/b] GFX Coder
Name: Age: Experience: Msn: Email
Client Coder
Name: Age: Experiance: Msn: Email: Can you create models?
Webpage Developer
Name: Age: Experience: Msn: Email:
Script Writer
Name: Age: Experience: Msn: Email:
Writer
Name: Age: experience: Msn: Email: Info: Being a writer meens you have to write no code.. All you do is write a base e.g if you was writing a idea for a quest you could write the quest out, what rewards a player would get, what level Reqiurements a player needs, Who the player needs to talk to, ect.
We looking forward to seeing alot of aplications. Mod Makka, Mod Connor, Mod Mango. [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/8vvneq.png[/img]

item.title: Mythik Gaming! The 562 experience of a life time
item.dc:creator: @rspsking rspsking
item.description:
@rspsking wrote:

[quote=“david2471, post:6, topic:391771”]Im Not folowing the format of applying lol
coded 562 for 1and a half year
got my own server just cant host it
its 562 loading 602 working overloads
chaotics primal bosses all skills working 100% except summoning wich is 70% because
some pouches dont work
added 2 new boss working on a quest to make it more challenging
has over 50+ boss and nice custom home in karamja
working donator/membershop status working clan wars
fully working pvp drops
i also have a 614 wich im trying to make it load 634
it has alot of stuff added to wich im not gonna type it down here
the end lol[/quote]
David, I’ve added everyone on msn (windows live messnger) exept you, becuse you didn’t supply a email.

Read full topic

item.title: Mythik Gaming! The 562 experience of a life time
item.dc:creator: @rspsking rspsking
item.description:
@rspsking wrote:

Hey welcome to our development page,

Introduction
Well… Were using runesource 562, Witch is a very basic source, not many skills working at all.
Has a very basic shop system witch is very glitchy. A few commands have been added also a few shops.

[size=18pt]Server Infomation[/size]
Woodcutting 90%
Fishing 60%
Fletching 0%
Slayer 85%
firemaking 100%
Agility 100%
Cooking 58%
Strength, range, mage, attack & defence 100%
Prayer 100%

All ancient magic spells.
All Normal magic spells.
Some lunar magic spells.

White portal 99.9%
Dangerous pking 100&
Working EP

[size=18pt]Our Goals![/size]

  • A good economic system, no ::item command.
  • A player count of 10 active players.
  • Working quest’s.
  • Minigames such as Pest Controll & Warriors Guild.
  • Woking skills, Woodcutting, Herblore, Fishing ect.
  • A dedicated team willing to give there time to help inprove Mythik.
  • Nice community
  • And alot more!

Aplications;
GFX Coder

Name: Age: Experience: Msn: Email

Client Coder

Name: Age: Experiance: Msn: Email: Can you create models?

Webpage Developer

Name: Age: Experience: Msn: Email:

Script Writer

Name: Age: Experience: Msn: Email:

Writer

Name: Age: experience: Msn: Email: Info: Being a writer meens you have to write no code.. All you do is write a base e.g if you was writing a idea for a quest you could write the quest out, what rewards a player would get, what level Reqiurements a player needs, Who the player needs to talk to, ect.

We looking forward to seeing alot of aplications.
Mod Makka,
Mod Connor,
Mod Mango.

Read full topic
